description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Xtreme Polygon is a game of where up to 16 players can go against each other in an arena of powerups and deadly shapes. With Xbox live play or system link play, things can get a bit hectic during battles. Collect powerups to spawn enemies to hinder your opponents progress.
description.short: Xtreme Polygon is a game of where up to 16 players can go against each other in an arena of powerups and deadly shapes. With Xbox live play or system link play, things can get a bit hectic during battles. Collect powerups to spawn enemies to hinder your opponents progress.
